SEARCH
Package game.body.items

Class ItemFrame

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.body.items.ItemFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealthPotion, StrengthPotion
public abstract class ItemFrame extends city.cs.engine.StaticBody
Abstract class for all item bodies in the game. This class implements the itemInterface and extends the StaticBody class.
Since:
02-03-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk
See Also:
  • itemInterface
  • StaticBody

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemFrame

      public ItemFrame(city.cs.engine.Shape shape, ItemType itemType, ItemSize size, ItemBehaviour behaviour, GameWorld gameWorld)
      Constructs an ItemBody object.
      Parameters:
      shape - is of the Shape parent class, meaning that the item supports being a polygon, square or circle.
      itemType - the item type of the ItemBody enums, allows for potential static references of future item classes with only the ItemBody accessible.
      size - the size of the item
      behaviour - the behaviour of the item
      gameWorld - the game world to add the item to
      See Also:
      • ItemType
      • ItemSize
      • ItemBehaviour
      • GameWorld

      public void setInInventory(boolean inInventory)
      Sets the boolean value for whether the item is in the inventory or not.
      true if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      inInventory - the boolean value to set
